p: The determination of the peroxide value of walnut oil samples was made following the spectrophotometrical IDF standard method, 74A: 1991 (IDF, 1991). Its iodine and acid values were determined according to the procedure of AOCS Official Method CD 1‐25 and CD 3d‐63 respectively (AOCS, 2003). Finally, its thiobarbituric acid value was evaluated as described by Draper and Hadley ( 1990).
